comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Los Angeles herald, August 23, 1908, Page 7 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn85042462/1908-08-23/ed-... and NT of March 29, 1908 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F60B1FF7345A1773... indicates that a James R Deering and a Violet Pierce, daughter of Henry Clay Pierce, were married in March 1908. New-York tribune., May 22, 1921, Image 39 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83030214/1921-05-22/ed-... has a photo of Mrs. Deering that looks to be the same woman, identifying her as the former Violet Pierce.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: A son of the former Violet Pierce, William R. Deering, class of '37 at Yale, was engaged in 1941 to a Louise Dowdney. select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F60B1FFB345F1773... (subscription required)
